message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go. This product is truly top-of-the-line and worth every penny. I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.  What do you say?
